name: bookshelf
look_description: You take a second to take in the wall to wall bookshelf in all of its glory. Books line the shelves, each one a portal to a new and exciting world. As you gaze over the vast landscape of books, something catches your eye. A worn leather book slightly sticks out from the rest of the books, as if someone had tried to put the book back as quickly as possible.

touch.text: The book shelf feels solid and wooden.

knock over.text: You shove against the bookshelf in an attempt to knock it over. However it would appear that you are not strong enough.

push.text: You shove against the bookshelf in an attempt to knock it over. However it would appear that you are not strong enough.
